This includes wardened accommodation but not residential accommodation where health care is provided. It also includes Patients with no fixed abode.</td><td/></tr><tr><td style=\"white-space:nowrap\">29<a name=\"UKCore-SourceOfAdmission-29\"> </a></td><td>Temporary place of residence when usually resident elsewhere (e.g. hotels, residential Educational Establishments)</td><td/></tr><tr><td style=\"white-space:nowrap\">39<a name=\"UKCore-SourceOfAdmission-39\"> </a></td><td>Penal establishment, Court, or Police Station / Police Custody Suite</td><td/></tr><tr><td style=\"white-space:nowrap\">49<a name=\"UKCore-SourceOfAdmission-49\"> </a></td><td>NHS other Hospital Provider -
